接口的使用
com.thoughtworks.selenium.condition.ConditionRunner

  • 使用ConditionRunner的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.condition  

    • com.thoughtworks.selenium.condition中ConditionRunner的使用

      实现ConditionRunner的com.thoughtworks.selenium.condition中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultConditionRunner
      This ConditionRunner throws a simple RuntimeException when the condition is not met in the DefaultConditionRunner.waitFor(Condition) method.
      class  JUnit4AndTestNgConditionRunner
      This class throws an AssertionError when the condition is not met - the same as JUnit4 and TestNG do.
      class  JUnitConditionRunner
      This class throws an AssertionFailedError when the condition is not met.
      返回ConditionRunner的com.thoughtworks.selenium.condition中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ConditionRunner ConditionRunner.Context.getConditionRunner()
